income_messages:
From: d**********5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-13 13:12:36
SUBJECT:   Re: Greetings
  Re: Greetings
Dear friend, as this new month starts I pray that every drop of your
sweat may get a sweet reward. May excellence mark you out for favor.
Happy new month.
I hope this mail finds you well, I am writing based on the recent
conclude meeting held between Deutsche Bank Turkey and Industrial and
Commercial Bank of China This is to notify you that your name/email
was selected among the two beneficiary that Industrial and Commercial
Bank of China is compensating with USD$2Million each. This
compensation is to help individuals that lost their Job/works to
convid-19. ETC
You are advised to contact DEUTSCHE BANK  on this email
(  
deutschebk25@gmail.com
  ). Send them your
(1) Full Name
(2) Home or Office Address
(3) Your Mobile/Landline.
And also include your transaction code number which is ( 57HYH)
Without this code you will not be attended to.
Best Regards
Mr. Peter John
Relation officer   
From: d**********5@gmail.com
To: gv45856@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-13 16:20:41
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings
DEUTSCHE BANK
DEUTSHCE BANK A.Ş, ESENTEPE MAH. BÜYÜKDERE CAD., FERKO SIGNATURE NO. 175,
D:149, 34394 ŞIŞLI/İSTANBUL, TURKEY
+90 212 317 01 00
===========================================
May God who alone has the power to bless and curse bless your week and may
His light shine upon you this week. Wishing you abundant blessings.
  It may surprise you that you are asked to contact me, since there has
been no previous correspondence. Because the internet has been grossly
abused by criminal minded people making it difficult for people with
genuine intention to correspond and exchange views without skepticism
I am Mr. Orhan Ozalp,  Managing Director Deutsche Bank Turkey, you were
asked to contact me because the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
assigned me to release your funds of USD$2Million.  I am here to help you
release your funds legally without any measurement of anything unclean.
I have two modes of payment, Bank to Bank transfer ( OR) . I link your
funds to the Deutsche Bank branch in your country and give you your legal
back-up documents which you will use to claim your fund in that branch. Any
of these two modes of payment is acceptable by me because I am here to
assist you 100% in receiving your funds without any government agency
interference. My duty is to guild you legally as i did to the previous
first bagged and i am delighted they all has received their funds
Based on international/local stipulated laws for large funds transfer,
bankers and lawyers have misled innocent people like you, giving you wrong
guardians that are why you never receive any funds/transfer till date.
I need to register your transaction with the government that deals with
financial meters, enabling me to get your funds across to you without any
government agency stopping it. and to get this done USD$250 is the only fee
needed from you.
I will be delighted to work with you in all sincerity, truthfulness and
honesty because I am a man with Character, Competence and capacity. My word
is my bond and I assure you not to betray your trust.
Kindly get back to me on how you intend to send the fee: ( I ATTACHED MY
PASSPORT AND ID CARE FOR YOU HERE )
BEST REGARDS
ORHAN OZALP
MANAGING DIRECTOR DEUTSCHE BANK AG
==================DISCLAIMER:====================
THIS MESSAGE (INCLUDING ANY ATTACHMENTS) IS INTENDED ONLY FOR THE USE OF
THE INDIVIDUAL OR ENTITY TO WHICH IT IS ADDRESSED AND MAY CONTAIN
INFORMATION THAT IS CONFIDENTIAL, AND EXEMPT FROM DISCLOSURE UNDER
APPLICABLE LAW. PLEASE, IF YOU ARE NOT THE INTENDED RECIPIENT, YOU ARE
HEREBY NOTIFIED THAT ANY USE, OR COPYING IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED. IF YOU
HAVE RECEIVED THIS COMMUNICATION IN ERROR, NOTIFY DEUTSHCE BANK A.Ş,
ESENTEPE MAH. BÜYÜKDERE CAD., FERKO SIGNATURE NO. 175, D:149, 34394
ŞIŞLI/İSTANBUL, TURKEY
outbound_messages:
From: gv45856@l******s.email

SUBJECT: Re:   Re: Greetings

Best wishes,
Curtis
From: gv45856@l******s.email

That sounds like a great chance for both of us. I would like to talk further about your plans.
Best wishes,
Curtis
